A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw this film on the 17th\, but I am just now writing my review\, as there was so much to unpack and think about after the movie. Good CGI and good acting leads to a good movie\, and this was no exception. But it certainly wasn't the best. I almost feel as though too much happened\, and I am not sure where they will go and what they will do\, but I guess they want viewers to not know what will happen next. Problem I felt it had was that it had two major storylines going on at once. Usually a film has one major and one smaller storyline. This left me almost overwhelmed\, as the movie made me do all kinds of thinking\, which other films wouldn't make me do as much of. But if you overlook that\, this is a good Star Wars movie for anyone who enjoys awesome lightsaber battles\, and anyone who quite honestly likes Star Wars.
